title: WIP : Commander Keen Deathmatch
content:
Ever wanted a commander keen game with particles, DX9 stuff but with the same intense and frenetic 2D action? Ever wanted to be in total freedom and spawn your favourite enemies, powerups and start fighting and having fun? Well, my game has all of it.

For now it's an early beta. You can see the video here, and follow the progress on my forums : [url=http://www.ranmanpro.com/namelezz/vBulletin/index.php]www.ranmanpro.com/namelez.../index.php[/url]

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DYg4XH163UM]www.youtube.com/watch?v=DYg4XH163UM[/url]

title: Re: WIP : Commander Keen Deathmatch
content:
It looks kind of interesting, but it also seems to be in a very early stage, so I can't really say much about it. The aiming thing looks like a cool element, but I think Keen looks a bit unnatural leaning back like that. Something to do with the way his bottom half doesn't seem to move...------------------
[url=http://www.ericmushroomwilson.co.uk/] My website[/url]
[url=http://ericmushroom.livejournal.com/]My stupid journal thing[/url]

title: Re: WIP : Commander Keen Deathmatch
content:
Man, bravo! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] This looks great, exactly what I've imagined at times. Will it be a multiplayer game? Good luck.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: WIP : Commander Keen Deathmatch
content:
I agree with KeenRush, very nicely done!

(What does 'WIP' mean?) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: WIP : Commander Keen Deathmatch
content:
WIP = Work in progress. Usually a showcase of something that isn't quite done yet where the producer has every intention of completing the project.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.
